fields.name: x_coord
fields.description: Coordinate system specified in config file (longitude, UTM-easting etc.)

fields.name: y_coord
fields.description: Coordinate system specified in config file (latitude, UTM-northing etc.)

fields.name: node_type
fields.description: Optional. What it represents (intersection, transit station, park & ride).

fields.name: ctrl_type
fields.description: Optional. Intersection control type - one of ControlType_Set.

fields.name: zone_id
fields.description: Optional. Could be a Transportation Analysis Zone (TAZ) or city, or census tract, or census block.

fields.name: parent_node_id
fields.description: Optional. Associated node. For example, if this node is a sidewalk, a parent_nodek_id could represent the intersection  it is associated with.
